#summary List of Canonical Codes of Languages Recognized by PCSX2

Canonical codes for recognized languages are listed below.  When creating a new translation PO/MO set for PCSX2, you will need to create a new folder in the form of `/PCSX2 Install/Langs/[canonical]`.  Example: `/PCSX2/Langs/fi_FI`  for Finnish.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />
